thread.title: Man United news: Marcus Rashford tipped to become as good as Antoine Griezmann | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man United news: Marcus Rashford tipped to become as good as Antoine Griezmann | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man United news: Marcus Rashford tipped to become as good as Antoine Griezmann | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 10:11 am Marcus Rashford is being tipped to emulate Antoine Griezmann (Picture: Getty) 
Phil Neville believes Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford will be as good as Atletico Madrid forward Antoine Griezmann in ‘two to three years’. 
The Red Devils are keen on signing the Frenchman this summer and are expected to trigger the 25-year-old’s £85million release clause. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
Rashford, 19, has been used as a winger this term following the arrival of Zlatan Ibrahimovic but Mourinho’s been impressed with the England international’s application and attitude towards a new role. 
Griezmann will further boost Mourinho’s attacking options should he move to the club this summer but Neville’s told Rashford to embrace the competition and says the teenager will be as good as the Frenchman in years to come. Manchester United are interested in Griezmann (Picture: Getty) 
‘Marcus Rashford is good enough,’ Neville told The Times. 
‘Marcus will need challenging all the time because he’s got so much ability.’ 
‘You have got to be inspired by Griezmann [potentially] coming in. Marcus can be as good as Griezmann in two or three years’ time.’
